name: update_meta
body: let ix = metadata_instruction :: update_metadata_accounts (& ctx . accounts . meta_prog . key () , & ctx . accounts . metadata . key () , None , None , Some (ctx . accounts . new_update_authority . key ()) ,) ;
invoke (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . meta_prog . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . metadata . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . new_update_authority . to_account_info () ,]) ? ;
